column3: In my opinion, this make the code easier to read and maintain (by avoiding duplication) - but of course there might be an argument that templates should be used sparingly and only where absolutely necessary.  But I think this use does not introduce any complexity for readers of the code, as it is immediately next to the only usages.
The template is not that long, and it's only instanced twice. Not sure if it's worth it.\n\nutACK b9a19f3 anyway.
~0 on this, it factors out code but also saves only two lines
Closing this, I don't think this is worth making a change to the code, sorry\n
